name: Quattro Pro Spreadsheet
summary: A QPW file is a spreadsheet created by Corel Quattro Pro, a spreadsheet program provided as part of the Corel WordPerfect Office suite. It stores data in worksheets, which contain cells arranged in a grid of rows and columns. QPW files may also contain charts, mathematical calculations, scripts, styles, and formatting.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
